_WEBTRIT_APP_LINK_DOMAIN_DESCRIPTION: If provided, enables Android App Links integration via intent-filter. Must match assetlinks.json configuration on the target domain. This functionality is configured via Android flavors â€” if the value is non-empty, the 'deeplinks' flavor is selected automatically.
_WEBTRIT_ANDROID_RELEASE_UPLOAD_KEYSTORE: Optional path to directory containing upload-keystore-metadata.json and keystore file. Used to configure Android release signing automatically. If not provided, fallback to key.properties will be used.
_WEBTRIT_HTTP_ALLOW ED_DOMAINS_DESCRIPTI: List of HTTP domains allowed for cleartext (non-HTTPS) traffic. Use format: 'domain,includeSubdomains' (optional), separated by semicolons. Example: '127.0.0.1,false;dev.api.com,true;local.test'. If 'includeSubdomains' is omitted, it defaults to false. '127.0.0.1' is required for just_audio to enable local proxy features like headers and caching.
_WEBTRIT_CALL_TRIGGER_MECHANISM_SMS_DESC: Enable fallback incoming call triggering via specially formatted SMS (see CallKeep README for format and setup
_WEBTRIT_CALL_TRIGGER_MECHANISM_SMS_PREF: SMS prefix used to filter relevant messages for fallback incoming call triggering
_WEBTRIT_CALL_TRIGGER_MECHANISM_SMS_REGE: ICU-compatible regex pattern to extract callId, handle, displayName and hasVideo from the SMS body
